query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Report on legal and regulatory recommendations for the target countries
result.description: Development of legal and regulatory recommendations for the target countries This task will be based on the outcomes of WPs 2 to 4 and will provide the stakeholders with concrete recommendations for the enhancement of their respective national legal and regulatory framework for citizen financing The outcome of the task will be National recommendations for national policy makers and regulatory bodies on how to implement the representative pilot cases or on how to overcome the barriers which are preventing their implementation outcome of task 52

result.description: The report will identify and describe the citizen funding models already in place in the European energy sector It will review their delivery mechanisms and structured financing instruments used as well as their organizational and financial aspects The report will serve to elaborate the Map of Structured Financial Solutions for CFs4EE Financing Schemes outcome of task 31

result.description: The Toolkit will provide with a better understanding of the adoption of citizen financing for energy efficiency and will be addressed to any citizen private investor project promoter region local authority energy company and other stakeholder organisations coalitions and individuals that wish to get involved in developing and financing energy efficiency projects outcome of subtask 661

result.title: Action Plan for establishment of the Citizen Investment Platforms
result.description: This deliverable will detail the tasks and schedule to set-up the investment platforms including the evaluation of the resources (human and financial) required to operate the platforms during the project and beyond for each pilot countries/Regions. The insights reported in this deliverable will support the activities carried out in WP5 and WP6. (outcome of task 2.1)

result.title: CFs4EE Financing Scheme pilot projects evaluation report and Action Plan
result.description: The report will describe the Public Financing Instrument PFIs which is best adapted to the pilot countryregion depending the targeted investment program and the market characterization It will be completed by an Action Plan to serve as an operative plan that incorporates the technical financial and operational aspects to setup and operate the CFs4EE Financing Scheme outcome of task 24

result.title: Institutional, organisational and procedural report
result.description: "Drafting of a report addressing the institutional, organizational and procedural aspects of investment platforms. The report will provide guidelines and procedures to set-up and operate Citizen Investment Platforms in the pilot countries/regions. Part of the process is to explore how the platforms are to interact with the efforts on establishing Investment Platforms under the European Fund for Strategic Investments (EFSI) and the rules for operating such Investment Platforms according to the ""EFSI Regulation"". (outcome of task 2.1)"

result.title: Legal & regulatory investment framework analysis report
result.description: This deliverable will include the insights from the consultation with stakeholders on the legal & regulatory framework improvement, analysis of barriers/obstacles for citizen-oriented financial schemes at regional/national and at EU level and measures to be taken for improving the investment framework, thereby increasing the effectiveness of the Citizen Investment Platforms. (outcome of task 2.3)

result.title: Report on market characterization: segment & boundaries analysis
result.description: This will report on the market characterization of each pilot country/region. The deliverable will consist of a market barriers analysis and market segments evaluation performed through stakeholder consultation activities for each pilot country/region. The deliverable will serve as inputs for the evaluation and selection process of the Public Financing Instrument (PFIs) that will be best adapted to the regional market characterization. (outcome of task 2.4)

result.title: Map of Structured Financial Solutions for CFs4EE Financing Schemes
result.description: This deliverable will include the development and validation of a mapping tool of structured financial solutions for CFs4EE Financing. The mapping will help pilot countries/regions to analyze and compare the suitable Public Financing Instruments (PFIs) to set-up to support the development of their CFs4EE Financing Scheme. The mapping tool will also help to identify the implementation requirements, including the entire aspects of building well functioning CFs4EE Financing Schemes. (outcome of task 3.2)
